response.overview: In Vrbas, a small town in Vojvodina (adjacent to Hungary), with his uncle, a karateka and hunter, the 12-year-old Sale, is spending the summer far from his parents. He forms day-to-day relations with the rare individuals still in the village, who are much older than he is. Luka Papić empathetically observes the teenager’s initiation into the rites of the adult world to which he too will belong one day.
response.title: Grapevines
